quotes: Then on 16 November, Anand spoke out against clauses that gave the appointed 360 member Senate the same powers as elected members of the House of Representatives as well as a clause allowing permanent public officials and military officers to hold political posts.
In mid-June 1991, the outspoken president of the Labour Congress of Thailand, Thanong Phoarn, mysteriously disappeared.

organizations.name: Constitution Scrutinising Committee
quotes: At first, he refused to comment as the Constitution Scrutinising Committee, hand-picked by Sunthorn, made changes to what became the final draft constitution.

organizations.name: Constitution Drafting Assembly
quotes: The military-dominated Constitution Drafting Assembly refused to accept his suggestions and voted unanimously to pass the draft.
